SELECT A.PGID , A.PGMNM , A.PGM_DSC , A.FLNM , A.UYN FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_PGM A WHERE 1=1
AND A.pgid like '%' || #{pgid} || '%'
AND A.pgmnm like '%' || #{pgmnm} || '%'
ORDER BY pgid asc

SELECT A.PGID , A.PGMNM , A.UYN , A.FLNM , B.BTN_C , B.BTN_TPC , B.UYN AS BTN_UYN FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_PGM A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_PGM_BTN B ON B.pgid = A.pgid
WHERE A.pgid = #{pgid}
